Package com.enjin.sdk.serialization.converter

Class GraphConverter

java.lang.Object
retrofit2.Converter.Factory
com.enjin.sdk.serialization.converter.GraphConverter
public class GraphConverter
extends retrofit2.Converter.Factory
Body for GraphQL requests and responses, closed for modification but open for extension.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    protected class  GraphConverter.GraphRequestConverter
    GraphQL request body converter and injector, uses method annotation for a given retrofit call.
    protected class  GraphConverter.GraphResponseConverter<T>
    GraphQL response body converter to unwrap nested object results, resulting in a smaller generic tree for requests.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected com.google.gson.Gson fromJson
    Protected gson builder to make use of custom builder settings for deserialization.
    protected GraphQLProcessor graphProcessor
    Protected GraphQL processor.
    protected com.google.gson.JsonParser parser
    Protected parser to make use of the default parse settings.
    protected com.google.gson.Gson toJson
    Protected gson builder to make use of custom builder settings for serialization.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Modifier Constructor Description
    protected GraphConverter()
    Protected constructor because we want to make use of the Factory Pattern to create our converter.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static GraphConverter create()
    Returns a new graph converter.
    retrofit2.Converter<GraphQLRequest<?>,​okhttp3.RequestBody> requestBodyConverter​(java.lang.reflect.Type type, java.lang.annotation.Annotation[] parameterAnnotations, java.lang.annotation.Annotation[] methodAnnotations, retrofit2.Retrofit retrofit)
    HttpResponse body converter delegates logic processing to a child class that handles wrapping and deserialization of the json response results.
    retrofit2.Converter<okhttp3.ResponseBody,​?> responseBodyConverter​(java.lang.reflect.Type type, java.lang.annotation.Annotation[] annotations, retrofit2.Retrofit retrofit)
    HttpResponse body converter delegates logic processing to a child class that handles wrapping and deserialization of the json response results.

  • Method Details

    • responseBodyConverter

      public retrofit2.Converter<okhttp3.ResponseBody,​?> responseBodyConverter​(java.lang.reflect.Type type, java.lang.annotation.Annotation[] annotations, retrofit2.Retrofit retrofit)
      HttpResponse body converter delegates logic processing to a child class that handles wrapping and deserialization of the json response results.
      Overrides:
      responseBodyConverter in class retrofit2.Converter.Factory
      Parameters:
      annotations - All the annotation applied to the requesting Call method
      retrofit - The retrofit object representing the response
      type - The generic type declared on the Call method
      See Also:
      GraphConverter.GraphResponseConverter, Call

    • requestBodyConverter

      public retrofit2.Converter<GraphQLRequest<?>,​okhttp3.RequestBody> requestBodyConverter​(java.lang.reflect.Type type, java.lang.annotation.Annotation[] parameterAnnotations, java.lang.annotation.Annotation[] methodAnnotations, retrofit2.Retrofit retrofit)
      HttpResponse body converter delegates logic processing to a child class that handles wrapping and deserialization of the json response results.
      Overrides:
      requestBodyConverter in class retrofit2.Converter.Factory
      Parameters:
      parameterAnnotations - All the annotation applied to request parameters
      methodAnnotations - All the annotation applied to the requesting method
      retrofit - The retrofit object representing the response
      type - The type of the parameter of the request
      See Also:
      GraphConverter.GraphRequestConverter
